briefdescription.para: Coast.
Maneuver.
Will throw a RuntimeError if a maneuver exceeds the maximum duration.
The maneuver will be skipped entirely.
The maneuver will be shortened to the maximum duration, truncating the end.
The maneuver will be shortened to the maximum duration, truncating the start.

detaileddescription.para: The maneuver will be shortened to the maximum duration, truncating the edges, keeping the centered part of the maneuver.

briefdescription.para: The maneuver will be split into chunks from the leading edge.
Maximum maneuver duration violation strategy Strategy to use when a maneuver exceeds the maximum duration constraint.

detaileddescription.para: Example: Maximum duration: [---] Proposed maneuver: [------------------------------] TruncateEnd: [---] Center: [---] TruncateStart: [---] Chunk: [---] [---] [---] []

memberdef.name: Coast

briefdescription.para: Create a coasting segment.

memberdef.argsstring: (const String &aName, const Shared< EventCondition > &anEventConditionSPtr, const Shared< Thruster > &aThrusterDynamics, const Array< Shared< Dynamics >> &aDynamicsArray, const NumericalSolver &aNumericalSolver, const ManeuverConstraints &aManeuverConstraints=ManeuverConstraints())
memberdef.name: Maneuver

briefdescription.para: Create a maneuvering segment.

memberdef.argsstring: (const String &aName, const Shared< EventCondition > &anEventConditionSPtr, const Shared< Thruster > &aThrusterDynamics, const Array< Shared< Dynamics >> &aDynamicsArray, const NumericalSolver &aNumericalSolver, const Shared< const LocalOrbitalFrameFactory > &aLocalOrbitalFrameFactory, const Angle &aMaximumAllowedAngularOffset=Angle::Undefined(), const ManeuverConstraints &aManeuverConstraints=ManeuverConstraints())
memberdef.name: ConstantLocalOrbitalFrameDirectionManeuver

briefdescription.para: Create a maneuvering segment that produces maneuvers with a constant direction in the local orbital frame.

detaileddescription.para: The provided thruster dynamics are used to solve the segment at first. The maneuvers produced by this segement solution are then used to create a new thruster dynamics with a constant direction in the local orbital frame. This new thruster dynamics is then used to actually solve the segment.
If defined, a runtime error will be thrown if the maximum allowed angular offset between the original thruster dynamics and the mean thrust direction is violated.

parameterdescription.para: A maximum allowed angular offset to consider (if any). Defaults to Undefined.

briefdescription.para: String from maximum maneuver duration violation strategy.

parameterdescription.para: The maximum maneuver duration violation strategy

simplesect.para: String from maximum maneuver duration violation strategy

memberdef.name: solveWithDynamics_

briefdescription.para: Solve the segment with the provided dynamics and event condition. This method is used to solve coasting and maneuvering segments.

parameterdescription.para: The initial state of the segment

briefdescription.para: For a given maneuver, construct a solution that is Local Orbital Frame (LOF) compliant.

parameterdescription.para: The initial state of the segment

briefdescription.para: Solve the coast segment, uses the internal free dynamics array and event condition of the segment.

parameterdescription.para: The initial state of the segment

briefdescription.para: Get the thruster on/off condition.

parameterdescription.para: If true, the condition will trigger when the thruster turns on, otherwise it will trigger when the thruster turns off.

memberdef.name: solveUntilThrusterOff_

briefdescription.para: Solve until the maneuver ends. This maneuver is not necessarily constraint-compliant yet. It's assumed that the thruster is on at the provided state.

parameterdescription.para: The initial state of the segment

memberdef.argsstring: (const State &aState, const Instant &anEndInstant, const Shared< Thruster > &thrusterDynamics) const
memberdef.name: solveUntilThrusterOn_

briefdescription.para: Solve until the thruster is on. This is a coast arc that ends when the thruster is on.

parameterdescription.para: The initial state of the segment

memberdef.argsstring: (const State &aState, const Instant &anEndInstant, const Array< Shared< Dynamics >> &aDynamicsArray) const
memberdef.name: propagateWithDynamics_

briefdescription.para: Propagate the segment with the provided dynamics and event condition. This method is used to propagate the segment until a given instant, not based on an event condition.

parameterdescription.para: The initial state of the segment

memberdef.argsstring: (const State &aState, const Shared< Thruster > &thrusterDynamics, const Interval &validManeuverInterval) const
memberdef.name: solveManeuverForInterval_

briefdescription.para: Solve the maneuver for a given interval. Coasts until the start of the maneuver interval and then solves the maneuver for the given interval. This guarantees that we have a state at the start and end of the maneuver interval.

parameterdescription.para: The initial state of the segment

briefdescription.para: Re-evaluate the event condition. This function evaluates the event condition using the last two states in the state array, defaulting to the initial state when the size of the state array is not enough.

simplesect.para: True if the event condition is satisfied

briefdescription.para: Represent a propagation segment for astrodynamics purposes.
